title: S23 House Doors
description: Studio 23’s House Doors Pack is our in depth library of household door sounds offering a huge range of flexibility, containing 1092 high quality .wav files ranging from Doors, Cupboards and Drawers to Locks and Windows with Extras for added detail.
longDescription:
This will provide you ultimate freedom in any creative situation and has been designed with ease of use in mind. The pack consists of individually recorded and edited files, making them easy to drop into projects. All of the 1092 individually edited Mono sound files have been meticulously crafted and embedded with metadata so that they can be used without any further editing, cutting down on production time.


Metadata Sheet - https://drive.google.com/open?id=1V0Yk11iQuuBQi_BwNRtwUnIZADDXNBA9

Preview - https://soundcloud.com/user-785478514/s23_preview_doors_music_mp3_v2﻿
technicalDetails:
Audio Library Features

• Totalling 1092 high quality .wav files.

• Contains Cupboards, Doors, Drawers, Extras and Windows.

• 12 Different Door types each with Open and Close sounds.

• 11 Cupboard types, 7 Drawers types.

• Extras Include Lock, Creaks, Keys, Knockers, Scrapes, Squeaks and Kitchen Utilities.

• The pack is organised into folders for ease of use and has been embedded with Soundminer metadata to allow for a quick and efficient workflow.

• Audio recording at 96kHz and 24bit for HD quality


Door Types: Bathroom, bedroom, electric garage, front, front heavy, garage, glass slide, greenhouse, hallway, mirror, PVC, wood.


Cupboard Types: Cabinet, glass, glass panel, kitchen, kitchen version 2, pull out, spring, spring small, squeaky, wardrobe.


Drawers: Bedroom large, cabinet, garage, kitchen, old, wood, wood large.

Windows: Blinds, curtains, handle, lock, open, shut.


Extras: Bolt lock, brass door knob, chain latch, creak, keys, knocker, letterbox, safe, scrapes, squeak, utilities.


Number of Audio Waves:1092

Number of Audio Cues:1092

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/ 16bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 23 mins 37 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All
